Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.board

Class Board

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.board.Board
public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents the game board

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private static int BOARD_SIZE
    This is the constant lenght of a side of the board
    private Cell[][] tiles
    This groups all the tiles which make up the board

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Board()
    This method creates a board with BOARD_SIZE*dimension cells

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.Optional<Cell> fromBaseCellAndDirection​(Cell base, Direction direction)
    From a given base cell and a direction, this method retrieves the cell starting from base and moving by towards the given Direction
    Cell getCell​(int x, int y)
    This method returns the cell in position (x,y)
    java.util.List<Cell> getCellsList()
    Gets a List of all the Cells in the board.
    int getDimension()
    This method returns the side length of the board
    java.util.List<Cell> getTargets​(TargetCells target)
    This method returns the Cell instances targeted by target

  • Method Details

    • getDimension

      public int getDimension()
      This method returns the side length of the board
      Returns:
      the side length of the board

    • getCell

      public Cell getCell​(int x, int y)
      This method returns the cell in position (x,y)
      Parameters:
      x - the position of the cell on the x axis
      y - the position of the cell on the y axis
      Returns:
      the required cell

    • getCellsList

      public java.util.List<Cell> getCellsList()
      Gets a List of all the Cells in the board.
      Returns:
      the List of the Cells in the board

    • getTargets

      public java.util.List<Cell> getTargets​(TargetCells target)
      This method returns the Cell instances targeted by target
      Parameters:
      target - the TargetCells instance with the cells that are targeted
      Returns:
      a List of Cell objects that were targeted

    • fromBaseCellAndDirection

      public java.util.Optional<Cell> fromBaseCellAndDirection​(Cell base, Direction direction)
      From a given base cell and a direction, this method retrieves the cell starting from base and moving by towards the given Direction
      Parameters:
      base - the base Cell
      direction - the Direction
      Returns:
      the resulting Cell, calculated starting from base and doing a translation towards Direction
